project_descr: Support to Sustainable Transport in the City of Belgrade

outputs.output_descr: The goal of this project is to reduce national greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions in Serbia by meeting the project objective of improving access and sustainable transport modes in Belgrade. The project will achieve this by integrating land-use and transport planning to promote the use of bicycles and public transport modes, while rationalising parking tariffs and initiating social networking programmes to promote shared taxi and car use. Together, these activities are expected to reduce the growth of personal vehicle use and improve the transport management infrastructure to support the environmen
